doc:
Brian Rix https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Brian_Rix 0 Brian Norman Roger Rix, Baron Rix, (27 January 1924 – 20 August 2016) was a British actor and activist. After a stage and television career spanning more than three decades, Rix became a campaigner for disability causes. He entered the House of Lords as a crossbencher in 1992 and was president of the disability charity Mencap from 1998 until his death. Brian_Norman_Roger_Rix , Baron_Rix , ( 27_January_1924 – 20_August_2016 ) was a_British_actor_and_activist . After a_stage_and_television_career spanning more_than_three_decades , Rix became a_campaigner for disability_causes . He entered the_House of Lords as a_crossbencher in 1992 and was president of the_disability_charity_Mencap from 1998 until his_death .
